title: Final QA Audit Summary
verdict: QA AUDIT PHASE COMPLETE — 15 milestones (QA-MS0 through QA-MS14), 94 audit units, 47 findings (3 CRITICAL, 21 MAJOR, 23 MINOR). All CRITICAL issues resolved via REM-MS0. 5 proposed remediation milestones remain for MAJOR/MINOR items.

audit_scope.source_files_audited: 191 engines, 45 dispatchers, 103 cadences, 136 hooks, 50 algorithms, 14 registries, 32 test files

key_discoveries: 906 catch blocks across 154 files — consistent error handling
Only 1 empty catch block found in entire codebase
32 test files with strong safety and algorithm coverage
All 45 dispatchers universally wrapped by auto-hook proxy

omega_scores.pre_qa_baseline: Estimated 0.65 based on documentation accuracy and wiring gaps
omega_scores.post_qa: Estimated 0.82 — count corrections, safety fixes, 0 TS errors, comprehensive audit coverage
omega_scores.note: Omega scores are estimates; formal Omega recalculation requires OmegaEngine with updated inputs

audit_quality.depth: Symbol-level code review for all safety-critical paths
audit_quality.methodology: Systematic milestone-driven audit with envelope-defined units, steps, and exit conditions
